title: 201: Reset Your Mind with Movement with Aaron Alexander
description:
How can movement help you to reset your mind?

As promised, we will be continuing the conversation around what it takes to reset our brains during these uncertain times. 

This week, I’m thrilled to welcome back my good friend and movement coach, Aaron Alexander. Aaron is also a manual therapist, author of The Align Method, and host of Apple Podcasts #1 ranked show in Nutrition, the Align Podcast. 

In this episode, Aaron suggests that we have more control over our autonomic nervous system than we think. By using simple strategies around breathing, eye movement, and body language, he teaches us how to regain control and make progress throughout each day.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***

Or text me 310-299-9362 to get your burning questions answered and an insider sneak peek of exciting updates. I do my best to answer as many as I can each day, so shoot me a message today.
